title: Elegance Drops: Rose Gold Finish American Diamond Jhumka with Emerald Charm
materials: Crafted with a base of high-quality alloy and plated with a rose gold finish. Adorned with sparkling American Diamonds (Cubic Zirconia)
offering the brilliance of real diamonds at an accessible price. Features a vibrant green Emerald gemstone accent at the base.
features: A modern take on the classic jhumka design, these earrings feature a layered geometric pattern. Delicate American Diamonds are intricately set to maximize sparkle. The emerald charm at the bottom adds a touch of traditional elegance and symbolism.
colors: Rose Gold (Pinkish-Gold) and Sparkling White (American Diamonds) complemented by the vivid green of the Emerald
occasions: and festivals like Diwali or Sankranthi
where you want to blend tradition with contemporary style.
description: These Jhumkas offers a perfect blend of traditional South Indian jewelry aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The high-quality American Diamonds provide exceptional brilliance. These earrings are lightweight and comfortable for extended wear. The Emerald at the bottom signifies prosperity and good fortune.
